LanguageData.ElectricStove.label: electric stove
LanguageData.ElectricStove.description: A simple stove and attached countertop for preparing meals. Requires power。
LanguageData.ElectricStove_Blueprint.label: electric stove (blueprint)
LanguageData.ElectricStove_Frame.label: electric stove (building)
LanguageData.ElectricStove_Frame.description: A simple stove and attached countertop for preparing meals. Requires power。
LanguageData.ElectricStove_Pro.label: professional cook stove
LanguageData.ElectricStove_Pro.description: A professional-quality stove and attached countertop for preparing meals in bulk. Requires power。
LanguageData.ElectricStove_Pro_Blueprint.label: professional cook stove (blueprint)
LanguageData.ElectricStove_Pro_Frame.label: professional cook stove (building)
LanguageData.ElectricStove_Pro_Frame.description: A professional-quality stove and attached countertop for preparing meals in bulk. Requires power。
LanguageData.Canningstove.label: electric pressure cooker
LanguageData.Canningstove.description: A stove for canning foods, drying fruit, and making tofu. Requires power。
LanguageData.Canningstove_Blueprint.label: electric pressure cooker (blueprint)
LanguageData.Canningstove_Frame.label: electric pressure cooker (building)
LanguageData.Canningstove_Frame.description: A stove for canning foods, drying fruit, and making tofu. Requires power。
LanguageData.soylenttable.label: soylent machine
LanguageData.soylenttable.description: A machine to produce Soylent Green from humanlike corpses. Requires power。
LanguageData.soylenttable_Blueprint.label: soylent machine (blueprint)
LanguageData.soylenttable_Frame.label: soylent machine (building)
LanguageData.soylenttable_Frame.description: A machine to produce Soylent Green from humanlike corpses. Requires power。
LanguageData.TableSawmillElectric.label: electric sawmill
LanguageData.TableSawmillElectric.description: An electric saw for cutting logs into planks and kindling. Requires power。
LanguageData.TableSawmillElectric_Blueprint.label: electric sawmill (blueprint)
LanguageData.TableSawmillElectric_Frame.label: electric sawmill (building)
LanguageData.TableSawmillElectric_Frame.description: An electric saw for cutting logs into planks and kindling. Requires power。
LanguageData.ElectricSmelter.label: electric smelting furnace
LanguageData.ElectricSmelter.description: A furnace used for smelting more advanced metal ores, slag, and sand into metal alloys and silicon-based alloys. Can make metal cans and produce charcoal from logs. Requires power。
LanguageData.ElectricSmelter_Blueprint.label: electric smelting furnace (blueprint)
LanguageData.ElectricSmelter_Frame.label: electric smelting furnace (building)
LanguageData.ElectricSmelter_Frame.description: A furnace used for smelting more advanced metal ores, slag, and sand into metal alloys and silicon-based alloys. Can make metal cans and produce charcoal from logs. Requires power。
LanguageData.TableMachining.label: electric machining table
LanguageData.TableMachining.description: An electric table that can process stone chunks into blocks, rubble or sand. Can also make drill heads, create reinforced concrete and disassemble mechanoids. Requires power。
LanguageData.TableMachining_Blueprint.label: electric machining table (blueprint)
LanguageData.TableMachining_Frame.label: electric machining table (building)
LanguageData.TableMachining_Frame.description: An electric table that can process stone chunks into blocks, rubble or sand. Can also make drill heads, create reinforced concrete and disassemble mechanoids. Requires power。
LanguageData.TableElectronics.label: electronics table
LanguageData.TableElectronics.description: A table with tools for crafting electronic chips, robot parts, and the mobile mineral sonar. Requires power。
LanguageData.TableElectronics_Blueprint.label: electronics table (blueprint)
LanguageData.TableElectronics_Frame.label: electronics table (building)
LanguageData.TableElectronics_Frame.description: A table with tools for crafting electronic chips, robot parts, and the mobile mineral sonar. Requires power。
LanguageData.HyperTailoringBench.label: hyper tailoring bench
LanguageData.HyperTailoringBench.description: A sophisticated workbench equipped for tailoring and smithing advanced combat clothing, power armor, enhanced gloves and battle helmets. Requires power。
LanguageData.HyperTailoringBench_Blueprint.label: hyper tailoring bench (blueprint)
LanguageData.HyperTailoringBench_Frame.label: hyper tailoring bench (building)
LanguageData.HyperTailoringBench_Frame.description: A sophisticated workbench equipped for tailoring and smithing advanced combat clothing, power armor, enhanced gloves and battle helmets. Requires power。
LanguageData.MatterConverter.label: inorganic matter converter
LanguageData.MatterConverter.description: A converter to turn resources into inorganic matter. Inorganic matter can be used to make other resources. Requires power。
LanguageData.MatterConverter_Blueprint.label: inorganic matter converter (blueprint)
LanguageData.MatterConverter_Frame.label: inorganic matter converter (building)
LanguageData.MatterConverter_Frame.description: A converter to turn resources into inorganic matter. Inorganic matter can be used to make other resources. Requires power。
LanguageData.AdvToolBench.label: electric assembling bench
LanguageData.AdvToolBench.description: An electric table for the assembling of components, wires, mechanisms, and advanced mechanisms. Requires power。
LanguageData.AdvToolBench_Blueprint.label: electric assembling bench (blueprint)
LanguageData.AdvToolBench_Frame.label: electric assembling bench (building)
LanguageData.AdvToolBench_Frame.description: An electric table for the assembling of components, wires, mechanisms, and advanced mechanisms. Requires power。
LanguageData.ElectricSmithy.label: electric smithy
LanguageData.ElectricSmithy.description: A smithing table equipped for basic weapon and protective apparel production. Requires power。
LanguageData.ElectricSmithy_Blueprint.label: electric smithy (blueprint)
LanguageData.ElectricSmithy_Frame.label: electric smithy (building)
LanguageData.ElectricSmithy_Frame.description: A smithing table equipped for basic weapon and protective apparel production. Requires power。
LanguageData.EAF.label: electric arc furnace
LanguageData.EAF.description: An electric arc furnace for advanced metal alloy smelting. Efficient, but requires a lot of power。
LanguageData.EAF_Blueprint.label: electric arc furnace (blueprint)
LanguageData.EAF_Frame.label: electric arc furnace (building)
LanguageData.EAF_Frame.description: An electric arc furnace for advanced metal alloy smelting. Efficient, but requires a lot of power。
LanguageData.EConcreteMixer.label: electric concrete mixer
LanguageData.EConcreteMixer.description: An electric concrete mixer. Concrete is mixed from rubble and sand. Requires power。
LanguageData.EConcreteMixer_Blueprint.label: electric concrete mixer (blueprint)
LanguageData.EConcreteMixer_Frame.label: electric concrete mixer (building)
LanguageData.EConcreteMixer_Frame.description: An electric concrete mixer. Concrete is mixed from rubble and sand. Requires power。
LanguageData.DeepDrill.label: deep drill
LanguageData.DeepDrill.description: A deep-crust drilling rig for extracting minerals from deep under the surface. Use a ground-penetrating scanner to detect the resources。
LanguageData.Extractor.label: mine extractor
LanguageData.Extractor.description: The mine extractor digs deep into the ground to extract metal ores and rocks. Must be placed on a Deposits of Minerals. Requires power。
LanguageData.Extractor_Blueprint.label: mine extractor (blueprint)
LanguageData.Extractor_Frame.label: mine extractor (building)
LanguageData.Extractor_Frame.description: The mine extractor digs deep into the ground to extract metal ores and rocks. Must be placed on a Deposits of Minerals. Requires power。
LanguageData.ExtractorDebris.label: exhausted mine extractor
LanguageData.ExtractorDebris.description: This mine extractor will no longer produce resources and should be deconstructed。
LanguageData.RareExtractor.label: advanced mine extractor
LanguageData.RareExtractor.description: The advanced mine extractor digs deep into the ground to extract rare metal ores. Must be placed on a Deposits of Rare Minerals. Requires power。
LanguageData.RareExtractor_Blueprint.label: advanced mine extractor (blueprint)
LanguageData.RareExtractor_Frame.label: advanced mine extractor (building)
LanguageData.RareExtractor_Frame.description: The advanced mine extractor digs deep into the ground to extract rare metal ores. Must be placed on a Deposits of Rare Minerals. Requires power。
LanguageData.ExtractorDebrisRare.label: exhausted advanced mine extractor
LanguageData.ExtractorDebrisRare.description: This mine extractor will no longer produce resources and should be deconstructed。
LanguageData.OilExtractor.label: oil extractor
LanguageData.OilExtractor.description: The oil extractor digs deep into the ground and extracts crude oil. Must be placed on an oil fissure created by a drilling rig. Requires power。
LanguageData.OilExtractor_Blueprint.label: oil extractor (blueprint)
LanguageData.OilExtractor_Frame.label: oil extractor (building)
LanguageData.OilExtractor_Frame.description: The oil extractor digs deep into the ground and extracts crude oil. Must be placed on an oil fissure created by a drilling rig. Requires power。
LanguageData.Fissure.label: oil fissure
LanguageData.Fissure.description: A fissure that cuts deep into the earth. An oil extractor can extract crude oil from this。
LanguageData.FissureGenerator.label: drilling rig
LanguageData.FissureGenerator.description: A powerful machine designed to create a deep fissure. Must be placed on a Deposit of Crude Oil. Requires power。
LanguageData.FissureGenerator_Blueprint.label: drilling rig (blueprint)
LanguageData.FissureGenerator_Frame.label: drilling rig (building)
LanguageData.FissureGenerator_Frame.description: A powerful machine designed to create a deep fissure. Must be placed on a Deposit of Crude Oil. Requires power。
LanguageData.Refinery.label: refinery
LanguageData.Refinery.description: A chemical refining plant. Used to refine wood into chemfuel。
LanguageData.Refinery_Blueprint.label: refinery (blueprint)
LanguageData.Refinery_Frame.label: refinery (building)
LanguageData.Refinery_Frame.description: A chemical refining plant. Used to refine wood into chemfuel。
LanguageData.OilRefinery.label: Oil Refinery
LanguageData.OilRefinery.description: The glitterworld basic Oil Refinery is the first step in downstreaming crude oil into useable materials. Requires power。
LanguageData.OilRefinery_Blueprint.label: Oil Refinery (blueprint)
LanguageData.OilRefinery_Frame.label: Oil Refinery (building)
LanguageData.OilRefinery_Frame.description: The glitterworld basic Oil Refinery is the first step in downstreaming crude oil into useable materials. Requires power。
LanguageData.OilFeeder.label: Oil Refinery Hopper
LanguageData.OilFeeder.description: Holds crude oil for the Oil Refinery. Must be placed adjacent to an Oil Refinery。
LanguageData.OilFeeder_Blueprint.label: Oil Refinery Hopper (blueprint)
LanguageData.OilFeeder_Blueprint_Install.label: Oil Refinery Hopper (blueprint)
LanguageData.OilFeeder_Frame.label: Oil Refinery Hopper (building)
LanguageData.OilFeeder_Frame.description: Holds crude oil for the Oil Refinery. Must be placed adjacent to an Oil Refinery。
LanguageData.GC.label: gas centrifuge
LanguageData.GC.description: A thermal diffusion gas centrifuge is a device that performs isotope separation of gases. A centrifuge relies on the principles of centrifugal force accelerating molecules so that particles of different masses are physically separated in a gradient along the radius of a rotating container. A prominent use of gas centrifuges is for the separation uranium-235 from natural uranium-237。
LanguageData.GC_Blueprint.label: gas centrifuge (blueprint)
LanguageData.GC_Frame.label: gas centrifuge (building)
LanguageData.GC_Frame.description: A thermal diffusion gas centrifuge is a device that performs isotope separation of gases. A centrifuge relies on the principles of centrifugal force accelerating molecules so that particles of different masses are physically separated in a gradient along the radius of a rotating container. A prominent use of gas centrifuges is for the separation uranium-235 from natural uranium-237。
LanguageData.CentrifugeFeeder.label: gas centrifuge hopper
LanguageData.CentrifugeFeeder.description: Holds Uranium Ore for a gas centrifuge。
LanguageData.CentrifugeFeeder_Blueprint.label: gas centrifuge hopper (blueprint)
LanguageData.CentrifugeFeeder_Blueprint_Install.label: gas centrifuge hopper (blueprint)
LanguageData.CentrifugeFeeder_Frame.label: gas centrifuge hopper (building)
LanguageData.CentrifugeFeeder_Frame.description: Holds Uranium Ore for a gas centrifuge。
LanguageData.ElectricCrematorium.label: crematorium
LanguageData.ElectricCrematorium.description: Cremates corpses, apparel or various resources into ashes. Requires power。
LanguageData.ElectricCrematorium_Blueprint.label: crematorium (blueprint)
LanguageData.ElectricCrematorium_Frame.label: crematorium (building)
LanguageData.ElectricCrematorium_Frame.description: Cremates corpses, apparel or various resources into ashes. Requires power。
LanguageData.meditable.label: medical table
LanguageData.meditable.description: A table that is used to craft medicine and life support devices. Requires power。
LanguageData.meditable_Blueprint.label: medical table (blueprint)
LanguageData.meditable_Frame.label: medical table (building)
LanguageData.meditable_Frame.description: A table that is used to craft medicine and life support devices. Requires power。
LanguageData.TableChemlab.label: Petrochemical Laboratory
LanguageData.TableChemlab.description: A Petrochemical Laboratory where you can make byproducts of crude oil. Requires power。
LanguageData.TableChemlab_Blueprint.label: Petrochemical Laboratory (blueprint)
LanguageData.TableChemlab_Frame.label: Petrochemical Laboratory (building)
LanguageData.TableChemlab_Frame.description: A Petrochemical Laboratory where you can make byproducts of crude oil. Requires power。
LanguageData.TableOrganvat.label: organ vat
LanguageData.TableOrganvat.description: A large vat used to turn human corpses into biomatter and grow natural replacement organs. Requires power。
LanguageData.TableOrganvat_Blueprint.label: organ vat (blueprint)
LanguageData.TableOrganvat_Frame.label: organ vat (building)
LanguageData.TableOrganvat_Frame.description: A large vat used to turn human corpses into biomatter and grow natural replacement organs. Requires power。
LanguageData.BioRefinery.label: bio-refinery
LanguageData.BioRefinery.description: A machine for making biodiesel and silage。
LanguageData.BioRefinery_Blueprint.label: bio-refinery (blueprint)
LanguageData.BioRefinery_Frame.label: bio-refinery (building)
LanguageData.BioRefinery_Frame.description: A machine for making biodiesel and silage。
LanguageData.MechWeaponCraftingWorkTable.label: futuristic weapon workbench
LanguageData.MechWeaponCraftingWorkTable.description: A workbench that produces futuristic Mechanoid weapons, such as laser beam rifles. Requires power。
LanguageData.MechWeaponCraftingWorkTable_Frame.label: futuristic weapon workbench (building)
LanguageData.MechWeaponCraftingWorkTable_Frame.descri: A workbench that produces futuristic Mechanoid weapons, such as laser beam rifles. Requires power。
LanguageData.TableSynthetics.label: synthetic organ assembler
LanguageData.TableSynthetics.description: A workstation fully equipped with an extremely powerful nano-printer capable of producing synthetic organs and AI chips. Requires power。
LanguageData.TableSynthetics_Blueprint.label: synthetic organ assembler (blueprint)
LanguageData.TableSynthetics_Frame.label: synthetic organ assembler (building)
LanguageData.TableSynthetics_Frame.description: A workstation fully equipped with an extremely powerful nano-printer capable of producing synthetic organs and AI chips. Requires power。
LanguageData.TableBionics.label: bionics workbench
LanguageData.TableBionics.description: A workbench equipped for production of high-tech bionic prosthetics. Requires power。
LanguageData.TableBionics_Blueprint.label: bionics workbench (blueprint)
LanguageData.TableBionics_Frame.label: bionics workbench (building)
LanguageData.TableBionics_Frame.description: A workbench equipped for production of high-tech bionic prosthetics. Requires power。
LanguageData.UpgradingStation.label: cybernetics workbench
LanguageData.UpgradingStation.description: A workbench equipped for production of cybernetic implants. Requires power。
LanguageData.UpgradingStation_Blueprint.label: cybernetics workbench (blueprint)
LanguageData.UpgradingStation_Frame.label: cybernetics workbench (building)
LanguageData.UpgradingStation_Frame.description: A workbench equipped for production of cybernetic implants. Requires power。
LanguageData.RobAssem.label: robotic assembler
LanguageData.RobAssem.description: A machine that applies state of the art robotics to construct machine components too intricate for simple human hands. Requires 5000W power when active。
LanguageData.RobAssem_Blueprint.label: robotic assembler (blueprint)
LanguageData.RobAssem_Frame.label: robotic assembler (building)
LanguageData.RobAssem_Frame.description: A machine that applies state of the art robotics to construct machine components too intricate for simple human hands. Requires 5000W power when active。
LanguageData.Matterfab.label: quantum fabricator
LanguageData.Matterfab.description: The quantum fabricator is the forefront of quantum thermodynamics and plasma spectrometry. This machine disassembles elements into base subatomic particles and re-assembles them into powerful artificial elements. Requires power。
LanguageData.Matterfab_Blueprint.label: quantum fabricator (blueprint)
LanguageData.Matterfab_Frame.label: quantum fabricator (building)
LanguageData.Matterfab_Frame.description: The quantum fabricator is the forefront of quantum thermodynamics and plasma spectrometry. This machine disassembles elements into base subatomic particles and re-assembles them into powerful artificial elements. Requires power。
LanguageData.HadronCollider.label: hadron collider
LanguageData.HadronCollider.description: An apparatus for accelerating subatomic particles to high velocities by means of electric or electromagnetic fields. The accelerated particles are generally made to collide with other particles, either as a research technique or for the generation of high-energy X-rays and gamma rays。
LanguageData.HadronCollider_Blueprint.label: hadron collider (blueprint)
LanguageData.HadronCollider_Frame.label: hadron collider (building)
LanguageData.HadronCollider_Frame.description: An apparatus for accelerating subatomic particles to high velocities by means of electric or electromagnetic fields. The accelerated particles are generally made to collide with other particles, either as a research technique or for the generation of high-energy X-rays and gamma rays。
LanguageData.HadronColliderFeeder.label: hadron collider hopper
LanguageData.HadronColliderFeeder.description: Holds inorganic matter for the hadron collider。
LanguageData.HadronColliderFeeder_Blueprint.label: hadron collider hopper (blueprint)
LanguageData.HadronColliderFeeder_Frame.label: hadron collider hopper (building)
LanguageData.HadronColliderFeeder_Frame.description: Holds inorganic matter for the hadron collider。
